script.name: plugin.customstart.menu
script.sourceplaintext:
* ================================================= * CUSTOM START MENU * ================================================= * This is the menu event script for the Custom Start Configuation * ================================================= * Author: Cycrow * Date: 2018/04/12 * =================================================
$PAGE.ID = 38 gosub sub.GetVars
if $a.state == [MEvent.Start] $settings.table = table alloc $settings.table['name'] = 'Player' $settings.table['race'] = 0 $settings.table['racerank'] = 5 $settings.table['traderank'] = 0 $settings.table['fightrank'] = 0 $settings.table['money'] = 1000 $settings.table['sector'] = 'random' $table = table alloc $settings.table['known.sectors'] = $table $settings.table['known.sectors.type'] = 'selection' $settings.table['start.ship'] = Discoverer $settings.table['start.ship.loadout'] = 'loadout.s' $settings.table['random.ranks'] = 1 $settings.table['sats'] = 0 $settings.table['terrans'] = 0 $settings.table['phq'] = 'findable' set global variable: name='egosoft.customstart' value=$settings.table set global variable: name='egosoft.search' value=null gosub sub.BuildMenu return $input
else if $a.state == [MEvent.Switch] $menu.id = $a.value[0] $selection = $a.value[1] $value = $a.value[2] if $menu.id == 'mainmenu' $settings.table[$selection] = $value gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end
else if $a.state == [MEvent.Returned] $menu.id = $a.value[0] $selection = $a.value[1] $value = $a.value[2] set global variable: name='egosoft.search' value=null if $selection == 'known.sector' gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu else if $selection == 'add.station.sector' $type = $settings.table['add.station'] if is datatype[ $value ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $table = $settings.table['stations'] skip if $table $table = table alloc $settings.table['stations'] = $table $stations = $table[$type] skip if $stations $stations = array alloc: size=0 $table[$type] = $stations append $value to array $stations gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu else if is datatype[ $value ] == DATATYPE_SECTOR $sub.Input = $value gosub sub.ShowSector $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$PAGE.ID textid=211, $type, null, null, null, null $input = create input: id=$selection, user input=Var/Sector Position, refobj=null, description=$read.text, sector=$value, filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=null, default=null end return $input else if $selection == 'phq.known.sector' OR $selection == 'phq.sector' if is datatype[ $value ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $settings.table['phq'] = $value gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu else if is datatype[ $value ] == DATATYPE_SECTOR $sub.Input = $value gosub sub.ShowSector $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=208 $input = create input: id=$selection, user input=Var/Sector Position, refobj=null, description=$read.text, sector=$value, filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=null, default=null return $input end else if not is datatype[ $value ] == DATATYPE_NULL if $menu.id == 'mainmenu' $settings.table[$selection] = $value if $selection == 'start.ship' $sub.Val = 'start.ship.loadout' gosub sub.GetShipLoadout return $input
else if $selection == 'savename' gosub sub.SaveStart
else if $selection == 'loadname' gosub sub.LoadStart *gosub sub.BuildMenu
else if $selection == 'add.ship' $sub.Val = 'add.ship.loadout' gosub sub.GetShipLoadout return $input
else if $selection == 'add.station' $type = $value gosub sub.GetAvailableSectors $sub.Input = $ret.Sub gosub sub.ConvertArrayToMenu $title = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=205 $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$PAGE.ID textid=212, $type, null, null, null, null $input = create input: id='add.station.sector' menu=$menu title=$title description=$read.text callback=null return $input
else if $selection == 'add.ship.loadout' $type = $settings.table['add.ship'] $add.ship = $settings.table['ships'] if not $add.ship $add.ship = table alloc $settings.table['ships'] = $add.ship end $table = $add.ship[$type] if not $table $table = table alloc $add.ship[$type] = $table end $i = $table[$value] skip if $i $i = 0 inc $i = $table[$value] = $i end gosub sub.BuildMenu return $menu end end end
else if $a.state == 'save' $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=213 $default = $settings.table['savename'] $input = create input: id='savename', user input=Var/String, refobj=$a.obj, description=$read.text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=null, default=$default return $input
else if $a.state == 'load' gosub sub.LoadMenu return $input
else if $a.state == [MEvent.Select] $menu.id = $a.value[0] $selection = $a.value[1] if $menu.id == 'mainmenu' if $selection == 'randomname' gosub sub.GetCurrentRace $gender = $settings.table['race.gender'] $value = get random name: race=$settings.race, female=$gender $settings.table['name'] = $value gosub sub.BuildMenu $input = create input return value: update menu=$menu return $input end else if $menu.id == 'known.sector'
if $selection == 'sectors.none' $table = table alloc $settings.table['known.sectors'] = $table
else if $selection == 'sectors.all' gosub sub.GetAvailableSectors $settings.table['known.sectors'] = $sub.Table
else if $selection == 'sectors.race' gosub sub.GetCurrentRace gosub sub.GetAvailableSectors $table = table alloc $i = size of array $ret.Sub while $i dec $i = $sector = $ret.Sub[$i] $owner = $sector -> get owner race do if $owner == $settings.race $table[$sector] = [TRUE] end $settings.table['known.sectors'] = $table
else if is datatype[ $selection ] == DATATYPE_SECTOR $table = $settings.table['known.sectors'] if $table[$selection] remove key $selection from table $table else $table[$selection] = [TRUE] end end gosub sub.KnownSectors $input = create input return value: update menu=$menu return $input end
else if $a.state == [MEvent.Search] $selection = $a.value[0] $value = $a.value[1] $string.len = get length of string $value if $string.len > 0 $search = $value else $search = null end set global variable: name='egosoft.search' value=$search if $selection == 'sectors' gosub sub.GetSector else if $selection == 'sector' gosub sub.GetSector else if $selection == 'known.sector' gosub sub.KnownSectors else if $selection == 'phq.sector' gosub sub.GetAvailableSectors $sub.Input = $ret.Sub gosub sub.ConvertArrayToMenu else if $selection == 'add.station.sector' gosub sub.GetAvailableSectors $sub.Input = $ret.Sub gosub sub.ConvertArrayToMenu else if $selection == 'phq.known.sector' gosub sub.KnownSector end return $menu
else if $a.state == [MEvent.Context] $menu.id = $a.value[0] $context.id = $a.value[1] $selection = $a.value[2] if $menu.id == 'mainmenu' if $context.id == 'start.ship' if $selection == 'shiptype' $sub.Val = 'start.ship' goto label sub.GetShipType else if $selection == 'random' OR $selection == 'random.race' $settings.table['start.ship'] = $selection else gosub sub.GetLoadouts do if $ret.Sub[$selection] $settings.table['start.ship.loadout'] = $selection end else if $context.id == 'station' $type = $selection[1] $value = $selection[2] $selection = $selection[0] if $selection == 'info' $input = create input: id='encyclopedia' encyclopedia page, ware=$type return $input else if $selection == 'remove' $arr = $settings.table['stations'][$type] remove element from array $arr at index $value $table = $settings.table['stations'] skip if size of array $arr remove key $type from table $table end
else if $context.id == 'ship' $type = $selection[1] $value = $selection[2] $selection = $selection[0] gosub sub.GetLoadouts if $selection == 'info' $input = create input: id='encyclopedia' encyclopedia page, ware=$type return $input else if $selection == 'add' $table = $settings.table['ships'][$type] $amt = $table[$value] inc $amt = $table[$value] = $amt else if $selection == 'remove' $table = $settings.table['ships'][$type] $amt = $table[$value] if $amt <= 1 remove key $value from table $table else dec $amt = $table[$value] = $amt end else if $selection == 'remove.all' $table = $settings.table['ships'][$type] remove key $value from table $table else if $ret.Sub[$selection] $table = $settings.table['ships'][$type] $amt = $table[$value] remove key $value from table $table $value = $table[$selection] skip if $value $value = 0 $value = $value + $amt $table[$selection] = $value end else if $context.id == 'known.sectors.type' $settings.table[$context.id] = $selection if $selection == 'selection' gosub sub.KnownSectors return $input end else if $context.id == 'phq' if $selection == 'known' gosub sub.KnownSector return $input else if $selection == 'selection' gosub sub.GetAvailableSectors $sub.Input = $ret.Sub gosub sub.ConvertArrayToMenu $title = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=205 $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=206 $input = create input: id='phq.sector' menu=$menu title=$title description=$read.text callback=[FALSE] return $input else $settings.table[$context.id] = $selection end end gosub sub.BuildMenu $input = create input return value: update menu=$menu return $menu end
else if $a.state == 'name' $value = $settings.table['name'] $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=200 $input = create input: id='name', user input=Var/String, refobj=$a.obj, description=$read.text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=null, default=$value return $input
else if $a.state == 'money' $value = $settings.table[$a.state] $value = sprintf: fmt='%s', $value, null, null, null, null $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=201 $input = create input: id=$a.state, user input=Var/Number, refobj=$a.obj, description=$read.text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=null, default=$value return $input
else if $a.state == 'sector' gosub sub.GetSector return $input
else if $a.state == 'start.ship' $sub.Val = 'start.ship' goto label sub.GetShipType
else if $a.state == 'add.station' $sub.Val = 'add.station' goto label sub.GetStationType
else if $a.state == 'add.ship' $sub.Val = 'add.ship' goto label sub.GetShipType
else if $a.state == 'mainmenu' $selection = $a.value[0] do if $selection == 'done' return [TRUE]
else if $a.state == [MEvent.Arguments] gosub sub.GetCurrentRace $settings.table['race'] = $settings.race gosub sub.GetRaces $i = size of array $ret.Sub $table = table alloc while $i dec $i = $value = $ret.Sub[$i] $id = get race id for race: $value $id = sprintf: fmt='rank.%s', $id, null, null, null, null $j = $settings.table[$id] $table[$value] = $j remove key $id from table $settings.table end $settings.table['ranks'] = $table $arr = create new array, arguments=$settings.table, null, null, null, null return $arr
else if $a.state == [MEvent.Finished] gosub sub.ClearVars end return null
* ====================================== * SUB: Load Save * ====================================== sub.LoadMenu: $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=214 $input = create input: id='loadname', user input=Var/String, refobj=$a.obj, description=$read.text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=null, default=$default
$files = get files in directory: 'CustomStarts' search pattern='*.xml' if $files if size of array $files $i = size of array $files while $i dec $i = $str = $files[$i] $string.len = get length of string $str $string.len = $string.len - 4 $str = get substring of $str offset=0 length=$string.len $files[$i] = $str end $sub.Input = $files gosub sub.ConvertArrayToMenu $title = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104795 $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104796 $input = create input: id='loadname' menu=$menu title=$title description=$read.text callback=null end end endsub
* ====================================== * SUB: BuildMenu * Builds the main menu * ====================================== sub.BuildMenu: gosub sub.GetCurrentRace $WIDTH.VALUE = 175 $menu = create custom menu array $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=3 add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$read.text set menu option: $menu, widthtype=[MenuWidth.Big] set menu option: $menu, prevent kill=[TRUE] set menu option: $menu, disallow close=[TRUE] $value = $settings.table['name'] $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=20 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$value add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text nextinput='name' value=null $ret = create menu return value: callback, value='randomname' $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=21 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=$ret
$default = $settings.table['race'] gosub sub.GetRaces $read.text = read text: page=35 id=1104205 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, value array=$ret.Sub, default=$default, return id='race', width=$WIDTH.VALUE allowtabs=[FALSE]
$race = $ret.Sub[$default] if $race == Argon OR $race == Terran OR $race == ATF OR $race == TerraCorp OR $race == OTAS $default = $settings.table['race.gender'] gosub sub.GetGenders $read.text = read text: page=35 id=1104624 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, value array=$ret.Sub, default=$default, return id='race.gender', width=$WIDTH.VALUE allowtabs=[FALSE] end
$sub.Val = $race gosub sub.GetRanks $default = $settings.table['racerank'] $noto = $default - 5 $text = create custom menu string notoriety bar: level=$noto, show empty=[FALSE] $text.noto = create custom menu column string, position=-250 length=0 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=22 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=100 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text = create new array, arguments=$text, $text.noto, null, null, null add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$text, value array=$ret.Sub, default=$default, return id='racerank', width=$WIDTH.VALUE allowtabs=[FALSE]
add section to custom menu: $menu
gosub sub.GetTradeRanks $default = $settings.table['traderank'] $value = ( $default * 100 ) / 30 $text = create custom menu string progress: width=100 progress=$value% $text.noto = create custom menu column string, position=-250 length=0 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=23 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=100 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text = create new array, arguments=$text, $text.noto, null, null, null add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$text, value array=$ret.Sub, default=$default, return id='traderank', width=$WIDTH.VALUE allowtabs=[FALSE]
gosub sub.GetFightRanks $default = $settings.table['fightrank'] $value = ( $default * 100 ) / 30 $text = create custom menu string progress: width=100 progress=$value% $text.noto = create custom menu column string, position=-250 length=0 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=24 $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=100 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text = create new array, arguments=$text, $text.noto, null, null, null add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$text, value array=$ret.Sub, default=$default, return id='fightrank', width=$WIDTH.VALUE allowtabs=[FALSE]
add section to custom menu: $menu $value = $settings.table['money'] $value = convert number $value to string $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=25 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$value add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text nextinput='money' value=null
$context = create context menu $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=26 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=56, returnvalue='random', hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$PAGE.ID textid=27, $settings.race, null, null, null, null add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=56, returnvalue='random.race', hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] add context menu separator: menu=$context $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=100 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=55, returnvalue='shiptype', hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] add context menu separator: menu=$context $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=8 add context sub menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=63, disabled=[FALSE] gosub sub.GetLoadouts $ret.Array = reverse array $ret.Array $i = size of array $ret.Array while $i dec $i = $value = $ret.Array[$i] $text = $ret.Sub[$value] add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$text, icon=63, returnvalue=$value, hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] end add context end sub menu entry: menu=$context $ret = create menu return value: context menu, id='start.ship', menu=$context, dynamic=[FALSE]
$default = $settings.table['start.ship'] $text = $settings.table['start.ship.loadout'] gosub sub.GetLoadouts $loadout.text = $ret.Sub[$text] if $default == 'random' $text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=26 else if $default == 'random.race' $text = sprintf: pageid=$PAGE.ID textid=27, $settings.race, null, null, null, null else $text = $default end $text = sprintf: fmt='%s (%s)', $text, $loadout.text, null, null, null $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=28 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue=$ret
$read.text = read text: page=35 id=1102453 add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$read.text $value = $settings.table['sector'] if $value == 'random' $text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=26 else if $value == 'randomrace' $text = sprintf: pageid=$PAGE.ID textid=27, $settings.race, null, null, null, null else $text = sprintf: fmt='%s', $value, null, null, null, null end $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=29 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text nextinput='sector' value=null
$settings.known = $settings.table['known.sectors.type'] if $settings.known == 'none' $text = read text: page=35 id=1104001 else if $settings.known == 'all' $text = read text: page=38 id=108 else if $settings.known == 'all.race' $text = sprintf: pageid=$PAGE.ID textid=44, $settings.race, null, null, null, null else if $settings.known == 'selection' $table = $settings.table['known.sectors'] $value = size of table $table $text = sprintf: pageid=$PAGE.ID textid=45, $value, null, null, null, null end $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=30 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text $context = create context menu $read.text = read text: page=35 id=676 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=51, returnvalue='none', hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] add context menu separator: menu=$context $read.text = read text: page=38 id=108 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=51, returnvalue='all', hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$PAGE.ID textid=44, $settings.race, null, null, null, null add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=51, returnvalue='all.race', hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] add context menu separator: menu=$context $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=101 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=51, returnvalue='selection', hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] $ret = create menu return value: context menu, id='known.sectors.type', menu=$context, dynamic=[FALSE] add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue=$ret
$read.text = read text: page=35 id=9503 add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$read.text gosub sub.GetYesNo $default = $settings.table['random.ranks'] $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=31 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, value array=$ret.Array, default=$default, return id='random.ranks', width=$WIDTH.VALUE allowtabs=[FALSE] if not $default add section to custom menu: $menu gosub sub.GetRaces $arr = sort array $ret.Sub $arr = reverse array $arr $i = size of array $arr while $i dec $i = $owner = $arr[$i] do if $owner == $settings.race continue $owner = get race id for race: $owner $id = sprintf: fmt='rank.%s', $owner, null, null, null, null $default = $settings.table[$id] if not is datatype[ $default ] == DATATYPE_INT $default = 5 $settings.table[$id] = $default end $sub.Val = get race from id=$owner gosub sub.GetRanks $noto = $default - 5 $text = create custom menu string notoriety bar: level=$noto, show empty=[FALSE] $text.noto = create custom menu column string, position=-250 length=0 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text $text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=100 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$sub.Val $text = create new array, arguments=$text, $text.noto, null, null, null add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$text, value array=$ret.Sub, default=$default, return id=$id, width=$WIDTH.VALUE allowtabs=[FALSE] end end
$read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=4 $text.val = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=200 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text = create new array, arguments=$text.val, null, null, null, null $read.text = read text: page=35 id=611 $text.val = create custom menu column string, position=-160 length=60 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text append $text.val to array $text $read.text = read text: page=35 id=1104205 $text.val = create custom menu column string, position=-260 length=100 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text append $text.val to array $text $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=7 $text.val = create custom menu column string, position=-100 length=100 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text append $text.val to array $text $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=8 $text.val = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=100 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text append $text.val to array $text add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$text $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=32 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text nextinput='add.ship' value=null
$add.ship = $settings.table['ships'] if $add.ship if size of table $add.ship add section to custom menu: $menu $arr = get keys: table=$add.ship $arr = sort array $arr $arr = reverse array $arr $i = size of array $arr gosub sub.GetLoadouts while $i dec $i = $type = $arr[$i] $table = $add.ship[$type] $size = size of array $ret.Array $j = 0 while $j < $size $value = $ret.Array[$j] inc $j = if $table[$value] $context = create context menu $ret = create new array, arguments='info', $type, $value, null, null $read.text = read text: page=35 id=812 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=29, returnvalue=$ret, hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] gosub sub.AddShipToContextInfo add context menu separator: menu=$context
$ret = create new array, arguments='add', $type, $value, null, null $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=102 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=11, returnvalue=$ret, hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] gosub sub.AddShipToContextInfo
$text.val = $table[$value] if $text.val <= 1 $ret = create new array, arguments='remove.all', $type, $value, null, null $read.text = read text: page=35 id=4248 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=66, returnvalue=$ret, hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] gosub sub.AddShipToContextInfo else $read.text = read text: page=35 id=1107 add context sub menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=66, disabled=[FALSE] gosub sub.AddShipToContextInfo $ret = create new array, arguments='remove', $type, $value, null, null $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=103 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=66, returnvalue=$ret, hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] $ret = create new array, arguments='remove.all', $type, $value, null, null $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=104 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=66, returnvalue=$ret, hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] add context end sub menu entry: menu=$context end add context menu separator: menu=$context $ret = create new array, arguments='loadout', $type, $value, null, null $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=105 add context sub menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=63, disabled=[FALSE] gosub sub.AddShipToContextInfo $k = size of array $ret.Array while $k dec $k = $loadout = $ret.Array[$k] $text = $ret.Sub[$loadout] $ret = create new array, arguments=$loadout, $type, $value, null, null add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$text, icon=63, returnvalue=$ret, hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] end add context end sub menu entry: menu=$context
$ret = create menu return value: context menu, id='ship', menu=$context, dynamic=[FALSE]
$text.val = create custom menu string type icon: type=$type $text.val = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=10 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$text.val $text = create new array, arguments=$text.val, null, null, null, null $text.val = create custom menu column string, position=10 length=200 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$type append $text.val to array $text $text.val = $ret.Sub[$value] $text.val = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=100 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text.val append $text.val to array $text $text.val = $table[$value] $text.val = convert number $text.val to string $text.val = create custom menu column string, position=-100 length=60 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text.val append $text.val to array $text $text.val = get ship class from subtype: $type $text.val = create custom menu column string, position=-160 length=100 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text.val append $text.val to array $text $text.val = get maker race: shiptype=$type $text.val = create custom menu column string, position=-260 length=100 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$text.val append $text.val to array $text add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue=$ret end end end end end
$read.text = read text: page=35 id=1102457 $read.text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=300 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text = create new array, arguments=$read.text, null, null, null, null $read.text = read text: page=35 id=715 $read.text = create custom menu column string, position=-180 length=100 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text append $read.text to array $text $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=47 $read.text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=180 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text append $read.text to array $text add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$text
$read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=33 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text nextinput='add.station' value=null
$stations = $settings.table['stations'] if $stations if size of table $stations add section to custom menu: $menu $arr = sort table keys: table=$stations $i = 0 $size = size of array $arr while $i < $size $value = $arr[$i] $sectors.array = $stations[$value] inc $i =
$j = size of array $sectors.array while $j dec $j = $x = $sectors.array[$j][0] $y = $sectors.array[$j][1] $z = $sectors.array[$j][2] $sector = $sectors.array[$j][3]
$context = create context menu $read.text = read text: page=35 id=812 $ret = create new array, arguments='info', $value, $j, null, null add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=29, returnvalue=$ret, hotkey=[Key.Identity], disabled=[FALSE] $read.text = read text: page=1904 id=20301 add context menu info line: menu=$context, name=$read.text, value=$value $ret = create new array, arguments='remove', $value, $j, null, null $read.text = read text: page=35 id=1107 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=66, returnvalue=$ret, hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] add context menu info line: menu=$context, name=$read.text, value=$value $ret = create menu return value: context menu, id='station', menu=$context, dynamic=[FALSE]
$read.text = create custom menu string type icon: type=$value $read.text = create custom menu column string, position=0 length=300 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$read.text $text = create new array, arguments=$read.text, null, null, null, null $read.text = create custom menu column string, position=10 length=300 right=[FALSE] colour=null text=$value append $read.text to array $text $read.text = create custom menu column string, position=-180 length=150 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$sector append $read.text to array $text $x = convert number $x to string with suffix $y = convert number $y to string with suffix $z = convert number $z to string with suffix $read.text = sprintf: fmt='%s, %s, %s', $x, $y, $z, null, null $read.text = create custom menu column string, position=-1 length=180 right=[TRUE] colour=null text=$read.text append $read.text to array $text
add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue=$ret end end end end
$read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=5 add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$read.text $default = $settings.table['sats'] $arr = array alloc: size=4 $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=107 $arr[0] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=35 $arr[1] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=36 $arr[2] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=37 $arr[3] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=34 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, value array=$arr, default=$default, return id='sats', width=$WIDTH.VALUE allowtabs=[FALSE] $default = $settings.table['phq']
$context = create context menu $read.text = read text: page=35 id=1102302 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=26, returnvalue='no', hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=39 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=26, returnvalue='findable', hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] add context menu separator: menu=$context $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=35 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=26, returnvalue='start.sector', hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=26 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=26, returnvalue='random', hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE]
add context menu separator: menu=$context $default = $settings.table['known.sectors.type'] if $default == 'selection' $default = $settings.table['known.sectors'] if size of table $default $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=43 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=26, returnvalue='known', hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] end else if $default == 'all' OR $default == 'all.race' $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=43 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=26, returnvalue='known', hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE] end $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=101 add context menu entry: menu=$context, text=$read.text, icon=26, returnvalue='selection', hotkey=null, disabled=[FALSE]
$ret = create menu return value: context menu, id='phq', menu=$context, dynamic=[FALSE] $default = $settings.table['phq'] if $default == 'no' $text = read text: page=35 id=1102302 else if $default == 'findable' $text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=39 else if $default == 'start.sector' $text = $settings.table['sector'] if $text == 'random' $text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=26 else if $text == 'randomrace' $text = sprintf: pageid=$PAGE.ID textid=27, $settings.race, null, null, null, null else $text = $text -> get name end else if $default == 'random' $text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=26 else if is datatype[ $default ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $i = $default[0] $i = convert number $i to string with suffix $j = $default[1] $j = convert number $j to string with suffix $k = $default[2] $k = convert number $k to string with suffix $default = $default[3] $text = $default -> get name $text = sprintf: fmt='%s (%s, %s, %s)', $text, $i, $j, $k, null else $text = $default -> get name end $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=38 $text = create text for custom menu, left=$read.text, right=$text add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue=$ret
gosub sub.GetYesNo $default = $settings.table['hub'] $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=41 add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$read.text, value array=$ret.Array, default=$default, return id='hub', width=$WIDTH.VALUE allowtabs=[FALSE] gosub sub.GetYesNo $read.text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=7100 insert $read.text into array $ret.Array at index 0 $default = $settings.table['terrans'] $text = read text: page=[Page.Menus] id=1104280 $read.text = read text: page=1000 id=118 $text = sprintf: fmt='%s: %s', $read.text, $text, null, null, null add value selection to menu: $menu, text=$text, value array=$ret.Array, default=$default, return id='terrans', width=$WIDTH.VALUE allowtabs=[FALSE]
$read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=6 add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$read.text
$read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=59 $ret = create menu return value: next input, id='save', value=null add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=$ret $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=60 $ret = create menu return value: next input, id='load', value=null add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=$ret add section to custom menu: $menu
$read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=42 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue='done' $title = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=1 $text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=2 $input = create input: id='mainmenu' menu=$menu title=$title description=$text callback=[Callback.Switch] endsub
* ====================================== * ====================================== sub.ShowSector: $arr = $sub.Input -> get station array from sector $sub.I = size of array $arr while $sub.I dec $sub.I = $sub.Val = $arr[$sub.I] $sub.Val ->set known status to [TRUE] end $sub.I = 0 while $sub.I < 6 $sub.Val = $sub.Input -> get warp gate: gate id=$sub.I do if $sub.Val -> exists $sub.Val ->set known status to [TRUE] inc $sub.I = end endsub
* ====================================== * ====================================== sub.ConvertArrayToMenu: $menu = create custom menu array set menu option: $menu, allow searching=[TRUE] $i = size of array $sub.Input while $i dec $i = $sub.Val = $sub.Input[$i] if $search skip if case insensitive string match, is $search in $sub.Val continue end add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$sub.Val returnvalue=$sub.Val end endsub
* ====================================== * ====================================== sub.GetShipType: gosub sub.GetRaces append Unknown to array $ret.Sub $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=202 $input = create input: id=$sub.Val, user input=Var/Ship Type, refobj=$a.obj, description=$read.text, without sector=[TRUE], filterclass=null, racemask=$ret.Sub, flags=null, default=null return $input
sub.GetStationType: $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=210 $input = create input: id=$sub.Val, user input=Var/Player Station Type, refobj=[PLAYERSHIP], description=$read.text, without sector=[TRUE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=[Find.ValidType], default=null return $input
* ====================================== * ====================================== sub.GetShipLoadout: $menu = create custom menu array gosub sub.GetLoadouts $ret.Array = reverse array $ret.Array $i = size of array $ret.Array while $i dec $i = $value = $ret.Array[$i] $text = $ret.Sub[$value] add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue=$value end $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=203 $title = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=8 $input = create input: id=$sub.Val menu=$menu title=$title description=$read.text callback=[FALSE] endsub
* ====================================== * ====================================== sub.AddShipToContextInfo: $read.text = read text: page=35 id=721 add context menu info line: menu=$context, name=$read.text, value=$type $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=8 add context menu info line: menu=$context, name=$read.text, value=$value endsub
* ====================================== * ====================================== sub.GetLoadouts: $ret.Sub = table alloc $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=107 $ret.Sub['loadout.none'] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=1999 id=100 $ret.Sub['loadout.s'] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=1999 id=101 $ret.Sub['loadout.m'] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=1999 id=102 $ret.Sub['loadout.l'] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=106 $ret.Sub['loadout.default'] = $read.text $ret.Array = create new array, arguments='loadout.none', 'loadout.s', 'loadout.m', 'loadout.l', 'loadout.default' endsub
sub.GetYesNo: $ret.Array = array alloc: size=2 $read.text = read text: page=35 id=1102302 $ret.Array[0] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=35 id=1102301 $ret.Array[1] = $read.text endsub
* ====================================== * SUB: KnownSectors * Build a menu to select known sectors * ====================================== sub.KnownSectors: $menu = create custom menu array if not $search $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=101 add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$read.text $ret = create menu return value: callback, value='sectors.none' $read.text = read text: page=35 id=676 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=$ret $ret = create menu return value: callback, value='sectors.all' $read.text = read text: page=38 id=108 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=$ret gosub sub.GetCurrentRace $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$PAGE.ID textid=44, $settings.race, null, null, null, null $ret = create menu return value: callback, value='sectors.race' add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue=$ret end
$table = $settings.table['known.sectors'] if size of table $table $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=30 add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$read.text $arr = get keys: table=$table $arr = sort array $arr $arr = reverse array $arr $i = size of array $arr while $i dec $i = $value = $arr[$i] if $search skip if case insensitive string match, is $search in $value continue end $owner = $value -> get owner race $ret = create menu return value: callback, value=$value $text = create text for custom menu, left=$value, right=$owner add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue=$ret end end
gosub sub.GetAvailableSectors if $ret.Sub if size of array $ret.Sub $table = $settings.table['known.sectors'] $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=46 add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$read.text $i = size of array $ret.Sub while $i dec $i = $value = $ret.Sub[$i] if not $table[$value] if $search skip if case insensitive string match, is $search in $value continue end $owner = $value -> get owner race $text = create text for custom menu, left=$value, right=$owner $ret = create menu return value: callback, value=$value add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue=$ret end end end end set menu option: $menu, allow searching=[TRUE] $title = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=43 $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=204 $input = create input: id='known.sector' menu=$menu title=$title description=$read.text callback=[FALSE] endsub
* ====================================== * ====================================== sub.KnownSector: $default = $settings.table['known.sectors.type'] if $default == 'all' gosub sub.GetAvailableSectors $sub.Input = $ret.Sub else if $default == 'all.race' gosub sub.GetAvailableRaceSectors $sub.Input = $ret.Sub else if $default == 'selection' $default = $settings.table['known.sectors'] $arr = get keys: table=$default $arr = sort array $arr $sub.Input = $arr end gosub sub.ConvertArrayToMenu $title = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=207 $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=206 $input = create input: id='phq.known.sector' menu=$menu title=$title description=$read.text callback=[FALSE] endsub
* ====================================== * SUB: GetSector * ====================================== sub.GetSector: $menu = create custom menu array if not $search $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=26 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue='random' $default = $settings.table['race'] gosub sub.GetRaces $default = $ret.Sub[$default] gosub sub.GetCurrentRace $read.text = sprintf: pageid=$PAGE.ID textid=27, $settings.race, null, null, null, null add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$read.text returnvalue='randomrace' end
gosub sub.GetAvailableSectors if $ret.Sub if size of array $ret.Sub $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=205 add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$read.text $i = size of array $ret.Sub while $i dec $i = $value = $ret.Sub[$i] if $search skip if case insensitive string match, is $search in $value continue end $owner = $value -> get owner race $text = create text for custom menu, left=$value, right=$owner add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue=$value end end end set menu option: $menu, allow searching=[TRUE] $read.text = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=209 $title = read text: page=$PAGE.ID id=35 $input = create input: id='sector' menu=$menu title=$title description=$read.text callback=[FALSE] endsub
* ====================================== * ====================================== sub.GetAvailableRaceSectors: gosub sub.GetCurrentRace gosub sub.GetAvailableSectors $i = size of array $ret.Sub while $i dec $i = $sector = $ret.Sub[$i] $owner = $sector -> get owner race if $owner != $settings.race remove key $sector from table $sub.Table remove element from array $ret.Sub at index $i end end endsub
* ====================================== * ====================================== sub.GetAvailableSectors: $kingdon.end = get sector from universe index: x=0, y=0 $sub.Table = table alloc $x = get max sectors in x direction while $x dec $x = $y = get max sectors in y direction while $y dec $y = $sector = get sector from universe index: x=$x, y=$y if $sector -> exists $value = get next sector on route from sector $kingdon.end to sector $sector if $value -> exists $text = sprintf: fmt='%s', $sector, null, null, null, null $sub.Table[$sector] = $text end end end end
if size of table $sub.Table $ret.Sub = get keys: table=$sub.Table $arr = get data: table=$sub.Table $ret.Sub = sort array: data=$ret.Sub sort values=$arr $ret.Sub = reverse array $ret.Sub else $sub.Table = null $ret.Sub = null end endsub
* ====================================== * SUB: GetRaces * ====================================== sub.GetRaces: $ret.Sub = get race array: include fixed=[FALSE], include corporations=[TRUE], include player=[FALSE] find and remove: Xenon from array $ret.Sub find and remove: Kha'ak from array $ret.Sub find and remove: Unknown from array $ret.Sub find and remove: Race 1 from array $ret.Sub find and remove: Race 2 from array $ret.Sub find and remove: Beryll from array $ret.Sub find and remove: Darkspace from array $ret.Sub find and remove: Industritech from array $ret.Sub find and remove: Corporation 1 from array $ret.Sub find and remove: Corporation 2 from array $ret.Sub endsub
sub.GetGenders: $ret.Sub = array alloc: size=2 $read.text = read text: page=1900 id=2502 $ret.Sub[0] = $read.text $read.text = read text: page=1900 id=2501 $ret.Sub[1] = $read.text endsub
sub.GetCurrentRace: gosub sub.GetRaces $sub.Val = $settings.table['race'] $settings.race = $ret.Sub[$sub.Val] endsub
* ====================================== * ====================================== sub.GetTradeRanks: $ret.Sub = array alloc: size=0 $value = 0 while $value <= 30 $text = get player trade rank text: level=$value append $text to array $ret.Sub inc $value = end endsub
* ====================================== * ====================================== sub.GetFightRanks: $ret.Sub = array alloc: size=0 $value = 0 while $value <= 30 $text = get player fight rank text: level=$value append $text to array $ret.Sub inc $value = end endsub
* ====================================== * ====================================== sub.GetRanks: $ret.Sub = array alloc: size=0 $value = -5 while $value <= 10 $text = get notoriety title: level=$value, race=$sub.Val append $text to array $ret.Sub inc $value = end endsub
* ====================================== * ====================================== sub.GetVars: $settings.table = get global variable: name='egosoft.customstart' $search = get global variable: name='egosoft.search' endsub
* ====================================== * ====================================== sub.ClearVars: set global variable: name='egosoft.customstart' value=null set global variable: name='egosoft.search' value=null endsub
* ====================================== * ====================================== sub.SaveStart: $save.name = $settings.table['savename'] @ do if [THIS] -> call script lib.xml.writedata : Data=$settings.table Name='CustomStart' Filename=$save.name Directory='CustomStarts' START speak text: page=[Page.MiscVoice] id=38 priority=10 endsub
* ====================================== * ====================================== sub.LoadStart: $load.name = $settings.table['loadname'] @ $data = [THIS] -> call script lib.xml.readdata : Filename=$load.name Directory='CustomStarts' Node='CustomStart' if $data $settings.table = $data set global variable: name='egosoft.customstart' value=$settings.table START speak text: page=[Page.MiscVoice] id=1294 priority=10 end endsub
* ====================================== return null

sval.val: This is the menu event script for the Custom Start Configuation
Build a menu to select known sectors
